context.p: The first step in providing services for Shell script executionAWSAzureOpenStackvSphere is to create one or more technical services.

step.cmd: Define one or more technical services in an XML file.

info.p: As a basis, you can use the technical service sample provided on https://github.com/servicecatalog/oscm-app-shell/tree/master/src/main/resources.
A technical service specifies Shell scripts as parameter options. You need to make them available as described in .
As a basis, you can use the technical services samples provided on https://github.com/servicecatalog/oscm-app/tree/master/oscm-app-openstack/resources.
The technical services specify sample templates as parameter options. You need to make them available as described in .

As a basis, you can use the technical service sample provided on https://github.com/servicecatalog/oscm-app/tree/master/oscm-app-azure/resources.

ul.li: Service parameters which correspond to the parameters specified in the Shell scripts. For details on the supported service parameters, refer to .

Import the technical services you created and appoint one or more supplier organizations for them.
